group.name: Additional Development
附加开发
group.description: Additional development headers and libraries for building open-source applications.
用于构建开源应用程序的附加开发标头及程序可。

group.name: Base
基本
group.description: The standard installation.

group.name: Conflicts BaseOS
与 BaseOS 冲突
group.description: This group includes packages conflicting with an everything installation from the BaseOS repo
这个组包括了与通过 BaseOS repo 安装的软件冲突的软件包

group.name: Container Management
容器管理
group.description: Tools for managing Linux containers
用于管理 Linux 容器的工具

group.name: Core
核心
group.description: Smallest possible installation
最小安装

group.name: Desktop Debugging and Performance Tools
桌面调试和运行工具
group.description: GUI tools for debugging applications and performance.
调试应用程序和性能的 GUI 工具。

group.name: Development Tools
开发工具
group.description: A basic development environment.
基本开发环境。

group.name: DNS Name Server
DNS 名称服务器
group.description: This package group allows you to run a DNS name server (BIND) on the system.
该软件包组允许您在系统上运行 DNS 名称服务器(BIND)。

group.name: Directory Client
目录客户端
group.description: Clients for integration into a network managed by a directory service.
用于整合到使用目录服务管理的网络的客户端。

group.name: File and Storage Server
文件及存储服务器
group.description: CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER, and iSNS network storage server.
CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER 及 iSNS 网络存储服务器。

group.name: Fonts
字体
group.description: Fonts packages for rendering text on the desktop.
用于在桌面显示文字的字体软件包。

group.name: FTP Server
FTP 服务器
group.description: These tools allow you to run an FTP server on the system.
这些工具允许您在系统上运行 FTP 服务器。

group.name: GNOME Applications
GNOME 应用程序
group.description: A set of commonly used GNOME Applications.
一组经常使用的 GNOME 应用程序。

group.name: GNOME
GNOME
group.description: GNOME is a highly intuitive and user friendly desktop environment.
GNOME 是一个非常直观且用户友好的桌面环境。

group.name: Guest Desktop Agents
虚拟机桌面代理
group.description: Agents used when running as a virtualized desktop.
作为虚拟桌面运行时使用的代理。

group.name: Hardware Monitoring Utilities
硬件监控工具
group.description: A set of tools to monitor server hardware.
一组用来监控服务器硬件的工具。

group.name: Hardware Support
group.description: This group is a collection of tools for various hardware specific utilities.

group.name: Headless Management
无图形终端系统管理工具
group.description: Tools for managing the system without an attached graphical console.
用于管理无图像终端系统的工具。

group.name: Infiniband Support
Infiniband 支持
group.description: Software designed for supporting clustering, grid connectivity, and low-latency, high bandwidth storage using RDMA-based InfiniBand, iWARP, RoCE, and OPA fabrics.

group.name: Input Methods
输入法
group.description: Input method packages for the input of international text.
输入非英文文本的输入法软件包

group.name: Internet Applications
互联网应用程序
group.description: Email, chat, and video conferencing software.
电子邮件、聊天和视频会议软件。

group.name: Internet Browser
互联网浏览器
group.description: The Firefox web browser
Firefox web 浏览器

group.name: Java Platform
Java 平台
group.description: Java support for the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server and Desktop Platforms.
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 服务器和桌面平台的 Java 支持。

group.name: Large Systems Performance
大系统性能
group.description: Performance support tools for large systems.
用于大型系统的性能支持工具。

group.name: Legacy UNIX Compatibility
传统 UNIX 兼容性
group.description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy UNIX environments.
用于从继承 UNIX 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

group.name: Legacy X Window System Compatibility
传统 X Windows 系统的兼容性
group.description: Compatibility programs for migration from or working with legacy X Window System environments.
用于从继承 X Windows 环境中迁移或者可用于该环境的兼容程序。

group.name: Mail Server
邮件服务器
group.description: These packages allow you to configure an IMAP or SMTP mail server.
这些软件包允许您配置 IMAP 或 Postfix 邮件服务器。

group.name: Mainframe Access
主框架访问
group.description: Tools for accessing mainframe computing resources.
访问主框架计算源的工具。

group.name: Network File System Client
网络文件系统客户端
group.description: Enables the system to attach to network storage.
启用该系统附加到网络存储。

group.name: Network Servers
网络服务器
group.description: These packages include network-based servers such as DHCP, Kerberos and NIS.
这些软件包包括基于网络的服务器，例如 DHCP、Kerberos 和 NIS。

group.name: Networking Tools
联网工具
group.description: Tools for configuring and analyzing computer networks.
配置和分析计算机网络的工具。

group.name: Common NetworkManager submodules
group.description: This group contains NetworkManager submodules that are commonly used, but may not be wanted in some streamlined configurations.

group.name: Performance Tools
性能工具
group.description: Tools for diagnosing system and application-level performance problems.
诊断系统和程序级别性能问题的工具。

group.name: Platform Development
平台开发
group.description: Recommended development headers and libraries for developing applications.
推荐用于开发应用程序的标头及程序库。

group.name: Printing Client
打印客户端
group.description: Tools for printing to a local printer or a remote print server.
在本地打印机和远程打印服务器中打印的工具。

group.name: Python Web
group.description: Basic Python web application support.
基本 Python 网页应用程序支持。

group.name: Remote Management for Linux
Linux 的远程管理
group.description: Remote management interface.
Linux 的远程管理界面。

group.name: Scientific Support
科学记数法支持
group.description: Tools for mathematical and scientific computations, and parallel computing.
用于数学和科学计算以及平行计算的工具。

group.name: Security Tools
安全性工具
group.description: Security tools for integrity and trust verification.
用于完整性和可信验证的安全性工具。

group.name: Server product core
group.description: Packages mandatory for the server product.

group.name: Windows File Server
Windows 文件服务器
group.description: This package group allows you to share files between Linux and MS Windows(tm) systems.
该软件包组允许您在 Linux 和 MS Windows(tm) 系统间共享文件。

group.name: Standard
标准
group.description: The standard installation.
标准安装。

group.name: System Tools
系统工具
group.description: This group is a collection of various tools for the system, such as the client for connecting to SMB shares and tools to monitor network traffic.
这组软件包是各类系统工具的集合，如：连接 SMB 共享的客户；监控网络交通的工具。

group.name: Virtualization Hypervisor
虚拟化 Hypervisor
group.description: Smallest possible virtualization host installation.
最小的虚拟化主机安装。

group.name: Virtualization Openvswitch
虚拟switch
group.description: vswitch installation.
安装vswitch。

group.name: Smart Card Support
智能卡支持
group.description: Support for using smart card authentication.
支持使用智能卡验证。

group.name: Basic Web Server
基本网页服务器
group.description: These tools allow you to run a Web server on the system.
这些工具允许您在系统上运行万维网服务器。

group.name: X Window System
X 窗口系统
group.description: X Window System Support.
X 窗口系统支持。

category.name: Development
开发
category.description: Packages which provide functionality for developing and building applications.
用于开发和构建应用程序的软件包。

服务器
category.description: Software used for running network servers
用于运行网络服务器的软件

应用程序
category.description: Applications to perform a variety of tasks
执行不同任务的应用程序
